___streamIdentifier.description: The name of the Stream that is currently executing

___startedAt.description: Milliseconds since epoch when this Stream was started

___verbose.description: Whether or not this is verbose

___nonHeapMemoryUsage.description: The amount of non-heap memory we are using

___heapMemoryUsage.description: The amount of heap memory we are currently using

___objectPendingFinalizationCount.description: The number of objects that are pending finalization
